rules: Always initiate 'sequentialthinking' to plan modular file distribution before writing.
Use 'context7' to maintain strict type alignment across Main and Renderer processes.
Utilize 'playwright' for automated verification of the Electron window state.
Prioritize Bun native APIs (Bun.serve, Bun.password, etc.) for performance.
Files must be atomic and single-purpose. Maximize code splitting.
Silent execution: Do not explain code in chat; modify the filesystem directly.
Workflow hygiene: keep GitHub Actions minimal, define explicit permissions, and pin actions to major versions.
Security scanning: prefer CodeQL for JS/TS when adding security checks.
Dependabot: ensure npm and github-actions ecosystems are configured at repository root.
